price: "Ai de mim! Quem dera não houvesse eu tomado fulano por amigo!
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
